product.title: Spectrum Almond - Venetian Blind
product.description: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use. Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm cream is a beautiful neutral colour, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm cream roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Valencia French Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: This valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee. Some might say buff or ecru, whatever you call it, it's a very nice neutral shade that adds just enough colour to the window. This colourway is beautiful in both modern settings and homes that favour this valencia roller blind is light cream; think of an extremely milky coffee.

relproducts.title: Rimini Dove - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rich simplicity of the rimini in dove is all you need for any room. Neither dark nor light, it allows just a little light to penetrate, and provides you with the privacy you need, when you need it. And this resilient, quality blind will last you well, year upon year. There aren't many colours or styles that the moderating monochrome of the dove won't work with. Set off bright reds, complement deep purples, or tame dazzling limes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Almond - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The rimini almond is a classic, creamy white offering that's sure to add a touch of elegance to any room. Its fine texture makes it soft to the touch, yet it retains the durability typical of the rimini range. Combine with bold patterns for effortless period chic, or with browns, beiges, and golds for a modern, opulent look. The almond's luxurious finish will particularly suit a living room or bedroom where relaxing is the main goal, but of course would work well in any room amongst most colour schemes.

relproducts.title: Rimini Cream - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: By embracing the simple things in life rimini cream brings you a little touch of luxury right where you need it as you craft your interiors to reflect who you really are. A delicately woven fabric plays host to the rich and calming nature of cream as your mind drifts off to your own personal oasis. Cream works in any room where you want to add that gentle homely touch that brings the rest of your decor together.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Smoke Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm smoke blue is a soft blue shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm smoke blue roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring pull acorn which removes the need for any cords maing them inherently child safe.

relproducts.title: Stockholm Dove Grey Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Stockholm dove grey is a light soft grey shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Their stockholm dove grey roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. As with all their made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.

relproducts.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind
relproducts.description: The genesis plain luxe cream offers a simple and stylish enhancement for your windows. This practical roller blind is designed with convenience in mind. Whatever room you hang this blind will also benefit from the dimout effect and uplifting cream colourway that will give the space a bright splash of warmth whatever time of day. Product id: db-rbx1947 fabric colour: soft cream material: 100% polyester lining: colour match polyester backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis plain luxe soft cream roller blind in cream.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Space Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum range's space blue is a classic, bold blue, on a delightfully smooth, satin-finish aluminium. Fully adjustable slats sit neatly, and can be easily manoeuvred to control the amount of light that is let into the room. Enhance a cool blue child's room by placing the space blue against pale blue walls or patterned wallpaper, pairing with white furniture, and accenting with playful primary colours.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Lima - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Let the natural apple green of the spectrum lima light up your home. The lightweight feel, yet sturdy quality, aluminium slats sit neatly and adjust easily, adding workability and function to style and aesthetics in this pretty blind. The muted green of the lima will match browns and creams in equal measure, and can even sit pretty amongst darker forest greens. Use for a lovely, colourful style in the living room, as a standout window feature in the dining room, or as part of a tranquil, calming scheme in the home office.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Casablanca - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum casablanca comes with just a hint of fruity orange, making it stand out from other shades of yellow. A shiny, gloss finished blind, it comprises of heavy gauge aluminium slats, alongside coordinating cords and rails. The colour-blocking trend doesn't seem to be going away, so take advantage and use the casablanca against bright sky blues, emerald greens, or stark whites in a den, playroom, or dining room.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Picton Blue - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: If you love blue in all its shades, but are looking for that perfect sky blue, look no further, because we've found it. The spectrum in picton blue is sweet blue that feels as if it's been grabbed directly from the sky, and matching rails and pull-cords streamline the look. The pretty, outdoorsy feel of the picton blue makes this the perfect choice for a light and airy kitchen, where you can recreate a sky-like feel by adding in whites and paler blues.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Solitaire - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in solitaire brings a barely-there cream with hints of pink or peach, proving that plain doesn't necessarily mean plain. The satin-finish aluminium is strong and durable, and most importantly, guaranteed not to sag. This wipe-clean blind is perfect for a bathroom or kitchen, and the subtle shade will be beautifully complemented by richer peaches or darker pinks, with silver accents providing the finishing touches.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Magic Mint - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum in magic mint offers contemporary style and a beautiful spearmint hue that will suit clean, airy rooms. The satin-finish aluminium is durable and lasting, with matching pull-cords and rails resulting in pure, uninterrupted colour. Offset mocha browns and soft taupes by placing the magic mint in the home office amidst light woods and white soft furnishings for a serene, relaxing feel.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Christine - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Add a hint of citrus to a dim window with the spectrum in christine. This fun, vibrant blind has a satin finish and neatly sitting aluminium slats that can be tilted or moved using matching cords according to how much light you would like in the room. Make the christine pop by hanging in a white kitchen or utility room, with colour-coordinated orange and contrasting lime accessories to bring out the gorgeous orange hue.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Pickled Bluewood - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The darkest of blues is blended with a muted, understated elegance, resulting in the pickled bluewood from the spectrum collection. This smooth, satin-finish aluminium blind has horizontal slats that are easily manoeuvrable using the colour-coordinated pull-cords. Keep light disturbances out in the den or home office with the cool pickled bluewood hanging pleasantly in the window, coupled with light greys and chevron patterning.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Gossip - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The spectrum's gossip is a funky lime green with a gloss finish that adds shine and class to the heavy gauge aluminium. The lime shade offers fun and vivacity, making this a bold and colourful choice. The gossip's bright hue will complement stark whites and other citrus shades, the perfect colour scheme for a teenager's bedroom or the home office. Alternatively, use as a complement to a monochromatic dcor scheme, to add a pop of colour in a black and white dining room or bathroom.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Mill Brook - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Creamy and luxurious, yet not overpowering, spectrum's millbrook is a delicious shade of brown. Its discreet satin finish only serves to promote this look, and this blind will look simply gorgeous with the slats adjusted either up or down. Give your home office an opulent feel that is also relaxing and unobtrusive, by placing against cream or pale taupe walls, and accessorising with the occasional splashes of soft aqua and pale gold.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy.

relproducts.title: Spectrum Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room.

relproducts.title: Origin Magnolia - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The queen of neutrality, the magnolia version of their origin aluminium range is a simple choice that will match almost any colour it's paired with. Its satin finish and colour-coordinated cords provide it with a streamlined look that only the best of neutrals can achieve. If you love colour-blocking and continuation, go as far as setting the magnolia amongst matching magnolia walls, resulting in a clean, aerodynamic feel in a living room, hallway, or kitchen.

relproducts.title: Wood Grain Effect 25mm Golden Oak Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Golden oak wood grain effect 25mm aluminium venetian blinds are a light to mid brown wooden shade. This colour will look fabulous with elegant creams and neutrals within the home or office. Product id: db-dven0378 fabric colour: golden oak s25065 material: aluminium headrail: co-ordinating slimline aluminium headrail - face or top fix brackets slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: cord & wand energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes wood grain effect 25mm golden oak aluminium venetian in brown.

relproducts.title: Turin 25mm Gloss Cream Aluminium Venetian
relproducts.description: Their range of turin 25mm aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A warm tone, this jersey cream venetian blind adds a warm light cream shade to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us which is why not only is this venetian blind made by their team of experts, but it also comes with a free five year guarantee.
